article_title: More Signs Employer Health Exchanges Lower Costs

article_metadata.description: Another batch of companies that turned to a new concept of giving their workers money to buy health benefits via private online marketplaces known as exchanges are seeing lower health care costs. Employee benefits consultancy Mercer says companies that moved to its marketplace saved “an average of $800 per employee.” About [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
